title: A-a Pwa Chenin Kot

lines: A-a pwa chenin Kot
A fang noun achengicheng
A-a amwusa ach tipis,
Sa winiti noun Kot. (2x)
Unusen ngaseno ren chaan Jesus
Nimeti seni ach tipis. (2x)

title: A Napanap An Kinas Ren Ach Pupungaw

lines: A lapalap An kinas ren ach pupungaw
A tatakis ren foforuch mi ingaw
Kichmeinisin sia mwanechfeil usun chok sip
Sia finata ia sipwe feino ia
niwinin ach tipis a nom won
Pwe sipwe kuna ach kinamwe
Jessu Kraist I ewe Al
A sip ne aninis non ach riafou

title: A Nom Lon Peiasan

lines: A nom lon peiasan, Jesus ach Samol,
Iwe, a ranilo lon lesosor.
Iwe, a kul ewe fau,
Jesus Kraist A manau seni ma
Jesus Kraist A tou seni peiasan,
Ach chon amanau pworaiti malo;
A manau, Amanau, Haleluia A manau.
Sounfiu ra mamasa peiasen Jesus,
Nge ra chok niueiti saramen lang.
Jesus ach souakom A manausefal,
Oukich chon kukumwir, sa manau ren.

title: A Tori ewe Fansoun mi Fokkun Auchea

lines: A tori ewe fansoun mi fokkun auchea
Ngeni Kich meinisin, chon fonufan meinisin
Pwe sipwe kan fori ach sipwe amolata
Sap ren pisek o moni pwe letipach.
Sa ki (kilisou) lone ei (fansoun)
Kloria (mwaret) mwaret (eti Kot)
Ren An (liffang) a ti (tinato) ewe Messiah (Messiah)
Epwe angasalo kich seni ach fotekin tipisin
Ach u ngeni Kot won fonufan (fonufan).
O ekkewe al mi por, repwe awenewen
Pwal ekewe mi mot, repwe pwal amasou
Pwal ekewe mi chukuta repwe sonoch
Me mwan ware ton ewe King lap Noun Kot.

title: A Tori Fansoun Kokoi won Fonufan

lines: Kot en ewe epilololun pochokul me popun
Mettoch meinisin, nang me fonufan
Ra fis ren Om kapas me Om tufich.
O en aramas seni pul ka fis ren tufichin Kot
Ka for pun ningen om Kot, inisum me ngunum
Kopwe eningano om Kot ren.
Kot en ewe Samolun Samol, Kingen King
Me popun mettoch meinisin; Fuu me poon ira
Ra ning ren Om kapas me Om tufich.

title: A Wor Emon Mwan A Mak Non Paipen

lines: A wor emon mwan a mak non Paipen
A mwan en ekiek
Pun esap mefi pwe forien Kot
An tufich meinisin
Epwe meta soponon Kot A pwisin apasa
No epwe pisekini ekana pisek mi chommong
Ika mano a koruk ikenai, sonap-mawan om fansoun
Mi eoch kopwe rang ei sokkun manaw
Pun kote rukono
Ren Pisek, money, pwan fonu chommong
Ka wou ren ikenai

title: A Wor Ew Fonu Fanitach Chon Kraist

lines: A wore w fonu fanitach chon Kraist
Nupwen a wesino ach sai
Esor riafou epwe witi kich
Pwe kinamwe chok epwe fis
Sipwe menemenoch nupwen sa kuna
Mesan ach Samon Jesus Kraist
Chommong million ier
Sipwe chufengen ren
Ach King oh Samon Jesus Kraist
Sisap lo seni ew leni mi ning
Sipwe Nom lion tori feinfeino
Sisap chemeni manawach me nom
Pun mettoch meinisin repwe fo

title: Ach Chon Amanaw Jesus A nom non Nang

lines: Ach Chon Amanaw Jesus A nom non Nang ren Kot
Nge ren An kirokiroch a feitiw fonufan
A eani cha me fituk, A chochon pwini kich
Non inisin me pomwan A wewe ngeni kich.
An umoumoch A napanap.
An chen a fokkun pwich
A nenienn neniach,
A fokkun pwini kich.
A nikiti An pwapwa A ponuku An ning,
A eani ach woungaw o pwal ach riafou
A pwal finata Lukach pwe Epwe nonom non
A mochen uwanong saram, kinamwe, chen o tong.
Ach feiengaw a mona, ach niuongaw a mwuch,
Pun ren ach Samol Jusus sa Fokkun chen ren Kot
Sa fokkun apinukoch o pwapwa ngeni nang.

title: Ach Kapongen Ei Ran

lines: Ach kapongen ei ran mi ouche mi kan apasa
Merry Christmas ami meinisin
Ikenai ranin An Jesus uputiw fonufan
A nikitano ningan, woun, me nenian
Wesewesen ren fanitom, ennetin pwan fanitei
Ifa usun, met ach niffang ngeni Jesus
Jesus A mochen sipwe fang unus manawach
Pwe sipwe usun ekewe sourur
Ra kuta, kuna Jesus fan nimochun netiper
Sipwe tumunu, checki-fichi manawach me ikenai
Pun site kan wewe ngeni ewe King Erotoes
Ra resin kuta Jesus nge rese kuna pw era kut
Fan ningeringer me songen netiper

title: Ach Kot Mi Tonge Kich Chapur

lines: Ach Kot mi tonge kich Chapur,
Pwe A tinato Jesus Kraist;
Pwe Epwe angasano Kich seni tipis meinisin.
Sipwe Kinisou ren ewe nifangen Kot
Ngeni kich chon tipis pwe sipwe manaw ren
O sipwe feino ren tori ewe manaw
O-o mwareiti Jesus mi amusano ach tipis.
Meinisin sipwe uta
Feino mwirin Samon Jesus
Pwe I mi ach Kompas ennet
Awena ngeni kich manaw.
Sipwe meireir, pwapwa Chapur,
Mwareiti Kot mi napanap
Won fonufan meinisin
Sipwe Pwapwa Mwareiti Kot.

title: Ach Samon A Eketi Kich non Ran in Manawach

lines: Ach Samon A eketi kich non ran in manawach
A kuna kich o masa kich o rongorongo ach fos.
A peni kich o pweni kich, a pwan iseis woch poun
Ach Samon A eketi kich non anach meinisin.
Ach Samon A eketi kich ne angang en ne ran
A pwapwa ren ach angangoch, a tina feiengaw.
Ach Samon A eketi kich ne attaw o ne sai
Lik meinisin ra nom ne poun, pwan asepwan me no.
Ach Samon A eketi kich ren ach kokon o mour
Pwe sosot me aniuaniu a toau seni kich.
Ach Samon A eketi kich lon anach al en ma
A eti kich ne feita nang, pwe sipwe nonom ren.

title: Ach Samon Jesus A nom Nang (A Mighty Fortress)

lines: Ach Samon Jesus A nom Nang,
A nemeni nang, fonufan
A nenetiw won fanufan o kuna mettoch meinisin.
A manaman o ling o fokun tipachem
Esor An osupwang, esor An rucola,
Netipan a pwonueta.
A mano fan asengesich,
Ach anumamaw a mor ren
Nge A pwan manaw sefal rech,
A feita nang non ning en Kot.
A fokun peni kich o tungor feiochuch
Ren Semach Kot non nang, pwe sisap feiengaw,
Non Ach mamun won fonufan.
Kich sounang sisap niuokus
O apinukunukingaw
Sa tupwon non ach nukunuk,
Pwe sipwe feioch o sopwoch
Mun Satan epwe ta, chon nukun repwe kuf
Chon pinei namanam, repwe ne feiengaw,
Mwuun Jesus epwe pworacho.

title: Acheniei Kana Meinisin

lines: (Acheniei) kana meinisin
(Ousap tup) ren pwapwan ei fonufan
A chok panuk, senuk ena kinamwe pwawpwa
Pwe a mochen kopwe riafou non manawom
Pwe a mochen epwe angei senuk manaw esemwuch.
(Kopwe) chemeni ewe nam
(Unusen) mano faniten
Om tipis esap ekieki, an asaw pwe ren faniom
Kopwe pichino o ngaseno
Pwe ren fanitom kopwe nimenimoch fan mesen Kot.

title: Ai Chon Nemenem o Ai Chon Mas Annim

lines: Ai Chon Nemenem o ai Chon Mas Annim
Pwan En Chon Emweni Manaw
Jesus ai Samon, Ka ennetin sinei
Ai kei chommong apwangapwang
Non manawei ikenai ren manawen ai sounang
Ren emweni-ngawen ai ekiek;
Sisap fangeta ngeni mwu- ngawen ei fonufan
Epwe nemenano manawach
Pun fonufan nenien sosotun manawach
Ren manawen ach sounang
Ipwenong non ipwen ach Samon Jesus
Pwe sipwene tapweno murin
Ipwe-ipw ipwe-nuk, Ipwe-ipwen nukuchar
Pun sipwe kuna manaw:
O met o met ka for ngeni ena nusun manawom
Anamota om fansoun non ranin Jesus Kraist
Sipwe mut ngeni pwe Epwe nemenem
Non unusen manawach
Pun Epwe namot ena nusun fansoun
Etiwa Jesus non manawach:

title: Ai Kot, Ai Kot Echok

lines: Ai Kot Ai Kot echok a tongeni,
Ai Kot Ai Kot echok a tongeni
Angasano kich seni ach riafou
O weires non mettach meinsin.
Sipwe sacheta ren ach Kot non nang,
O tungor ren epwe anisi kich
Fangeto pockokkun, kinamwe pwapwa
Non Jesus Kraist sipwe angei manaw.

title: Ai Kot, Kopwe Fori Noi

lines: Ai Kot. Kopwe fori noi ew netip mi nimoch, o fangenong
Ew ngun mi fo, pos; Kopwe amoino ai pupungaw
Non om umoumoch mi napanap.
Kopwe fokun tonu seniei ai fofor mi ngaw
Onimeti seni ei ai tipis meinisin.
Kosap nikitiei-no, kosap pwan angei seni ei
Ngunum we mi pin, Kopwe aniwinsefan
Ewe pwapwa mi nom nupwen En Ka amanawa ei.

title: Ai Osupwan Won Fonufan A mesemesekis

lines: Ai osupwang won fonufan a mesemesekis
Ai Samon A anisi ei Nupwen ai osupwang.
Fan chomong ua noninen o kechu nenukei
Ai Samon A achipa ei nupwen ai noninen.
Fan ekcoh ua niuokus o epinukingau
Ai Samon A apwora ei nupwen ai niuokus.
Pwan riafou a tori ei, cheuch a cheri ei
Ai Samon A apwapwai ei nupwen ai riafou.
Raningaw me ran murino mi wor non manawei
Ai Samon A eketi ei non rani meinisin.

title: Ai Samon Kot, Umoumoch Ngeniei

lines: Ai Samon Kot, umoumoch ngeni ei
Usun minne mi fich ngeni Om tong ennet,
Usun minne mi fich ngeni Om umoumoch,
Kopwe tönueno ai kewe fofor ingaw.
Kopwe animaei, iwe, upwe nimoch,
Kopwe tönuei, upwe pwechepwech seni snow.
Kopwe auraeino ren pwapwa o chengen,
Jopwe forata non ngang eu netip mi nimoch,
Nsenanong non ngang ey nguun mi fo o pung,
Kopwe sukano tinawei, pwe upwe mwareituk.

title: Ai Samon mi Napanap, Kosap Opunguwei

lines: Ai Samon mi Napanap, Kosap opunguwei non Om song
Kosap pwan ni-ei non Om ningeringer
Pun esap wor pochokunn inisi pokiten Om song
Esap pwan wor pochokunen inisi meinisin
Pokiten ai tipis
Ua pwarata ai kewe fofor mi ingaw meinisin
Ua pwan noninen ren ai tipis
Chokewe mi mochen nieino
Chokewe mi mochen eriafou-ei
Ra kapas usun ar repwe efeiengawa-ei
Nge ngang ua epinukunukuk, ai Samon mi Napanap
Ai samon me ai Kot, Ka ponuweni-ei

title: Ai Samon, Ka Etitinaei

lines: Ai Samon, Ka etitinaei, Pun Ka sinei ai fofor meinisin
Ne pwa o pwan ne op, ese wor mi mon sonuk
Ai fofor meinisin En Ka sinei.
Ita ia upwe suno ia ne,
Seni fan mesom, En ekis meinisin
Ka nenengeniei, o pwa niiei ren om tong
Ka emweniei no omwochuei.
Ai Samon, om kokot meinisin
Ra murinno, pun En Ka ekieki
Feiochun meininsin, pun En Kot mi murinno
Pwan En Kot mi uren tong feinfeino chok.

title: Ai Tipis Meinisin Ra Nom Won Canvary

lines: Ai tipis meinisin ra nom won Canvary
Ewe irapengesin Jesus Kraist
Chaan ewe Nam a nimeti ai tipis
Meinisin ra fein-seniei
Jesus En Chon Amanaw
Jesus angasa-ei-na
Ese wore w Achawen Manaw
Sipwe opono me ia
Me nukun ach Samon Jesus Kraist

title: Anon Ai Chon Amanaw (Jesus Paid It All)

lines: Anon ai chon Amanaw, “Nei, ka apwangapwang,
Mamasa o iotek, kuta noi om pockokkun.”
Jesus A moni ai tipis kana
Nimengawen tipis A nimeti ren chaan.
Ese wor rei och asor, epwe apwapwai Kot
Asoren chaan Jesus chok, epwe moni ai tipis.
Nupwen upwe feino nang o uta fan mesan
Upwe konun mwareiti, o pwarata feinfeino-

title: Ami Angei Iten Jesus

lines: Ami angei iten Jesus, ami noun sounang kana
Epwe angasano kemi, nupwen ami riafou.
nit a ning, echipwor, apwapwa fonufan, nang,
nit a ning, echipwor, apwapwa fonufan, nang.
Ami angei iten Jesus, pwe oupwe pworacho ren
Nupwen sost tori kemi oupwe achocho iotek.
Iten Jesus a men ningoch, I Epwe senani kich
An chen, An tong o umoumoch fokkun pweinifeini kich.
Sipwe nuku iten Jesus, pun a Fokkun manaman
Sipwe tumwunu An kapas, pun fokkun namot rech.

title: Amo Ikenai

lines: Amo ikenai (Amo iikenai), Jesus Epwee niwinto
Amo ikenai (Amo ikenai), Upwe kuna ai Samon
Amo ienai (Amo ikenai), Upwwe kunna ngaseno
Jesus Epwe feitto,
Angei ei ngeni nang,
Amo ikenai.
Jesus Epwee feito (Jesu Epwe feito)
Use sinei menni ran (Amo ikenai)
Mi tufich ne ran (Mi tufich ne ran)
Mi tufich ne pwin (Amo ikenai)
Tori An feito (Tori An feito)
Upwe sacheta nang (Upwe sacheta nang)
Upwe moneta manauei ngeni an feito.
Nge essaa mwo pwano (Nge esaamwo pwano)
Minne sipwe winiti (Sipwe winiti)
Nupwen A feito (Nupwn A feito)
O kori kich (Amo ikenai)
Nge sia sinei (Nge sia sinei)
Pwe sipwe usun chok I (Sipwe usun chok I)
O Sipwe kuna I Ion wesewesen napanapan.

title: Amo Kopwe Pwapwa Fansoun Christmas (Have Yourself a Merry Little Christmas)

lines: Amo kopwe pwapwa fansoun Christmas
Chip non netipom
Pwe kopwe ureno ren kinamwe
Amo kopwe pwapwa fansoun Christmas
Kopwe ne feioch
Ren unusen An Kot Chen o Umoumoch
Pwe kopwe mefi tongen Kot
Achok pwarano non Kraist
Pwe meinisin non om faminy repwe pwan ur ren nuku
Ika kich sipwe fokkun kinisou
O chechemeni
Mettoch meinisin a tori kich ren Kraist
Sipwe ennetin pwapwa non fansoun Christmas

title: Chommong Aramas Ra Asarongorgong

lines: Chommong aramas ra asarongorong
Ngeni ei fichifich An Jesus
Ra nenengeni nge usun rese kuna
Ra ausening ngeni nge rese rongorong
Pun ewe koten fonufan a achunano mesen netiper
Feiengawen poutmwanino.
Au seningom ngeni ei fichifich An Jesus
A mochen kopwe suki ngeni manawom
Epwe tonong o nemeni
Epwe pwan wanong manaw ese much
Ika kopwe suki ngeni manawom
Epwe tonong o nemeni.
Meta ei ka akamwochumwoch ngeni
Kote chok missini om ei fansoun
Paipen a apasa iei chok om fansoun
Ese pwan wore w fansoun
Kote chok tunano, kote nemenemeno
Nge a “too nate” fansoun om niamam
Kopwe fokkun ruko, osupwang, nichipung
O-o-o me atongom.

title: Chomong, Chomong Riafou

lines: Chomong. Chomong riafou mi nonom non netipei,
Nupwen ngang mi nom fan nemenian ei fonufan,
Chomong sokkun pwapwaw ra emweni ngeni ei,
Chomong riafou me pwan weires, ai upwe sopwongaw.
Nge kinisou ngeni Kot pun A fori ei ew an,
Ai upwe tongeni ngas seni ai kei riafou,
A mano won irapenges, ra posu nepekin,
Ra chufonu poun, pwe Epwene mano fan iten ach tipis.
Iwe ngemet ach kinisou ngeni Samach Kot,
Ren An fang noun Aneamon pwe Epwene mano,
Fan iten ach tipis, nge ifa usun non Netipach,
Ngeni Ach Jesus pun A fen mano won An irapenges?

title: Ei An Ese Fokkun Kamo

lines: Ei an ese fokkun kamo, Jesus A fen monatiw
Ngeni chaan mi fokkun manaman,
Feito iei chok fansoun.
Non eu ran sipwe uta mwen Kot, nge pwii
Kopwe feino ia; Ru an ra itino mwach, pwii
Menni ka ukuta won?://
Pwii meinisin sia fen sinei, usun An Kot tongei kich
Nge a sonap ngeni kich ika sise etiwa Jesus

title: Emon Chon Aani Kraist Non Manawan

lines: Emon chon aani Kraist non manawan
Awor manawen menemenoch
Non nonomun won ei fonufan
Pun Kraist chok ach epinukunuk
Jesus chok, o Jesus chok
I pipun tufich meinisin
Ka fan ngeni kich menemenoch
Non fansoun meinisin
Siowa ai Chon Mas mi Annim
Usap osunpwang ren och mettoch
Ka fen fang ngeniei ai-tufich meinisin
Ka emweniei none i an mi pwung

title: En me Ngang Sia Fin Meren Kot

lines: En me ngang sia fin meren Kot
Nupwen fonufan esamwo fis nge A fen sinei o A finuk
A pwan apsa, En nei kopwe feino won fonufan
O aronga Ai Kapas
Kopwe feino nemonun, o feita won chuuk
Kopwe ait ngeniir, ait ngeniir met ka fen sinie
Ait ngeniir met ka fen kaeo seniei
Nge kosap niuokus, kosap niuokus, ngang mi nonom reom
En me ngang sia ngas ren Jesus Kraist
Nupwen sa chuen mwanech non tipis
Nge A fen kuta kich o angasa kich
A pwan apasa, en nei kopwe feino won fonufan
O aronga Ai Kapas

title: Esor Itan Chon Fonufan

lines: Esor itan chon fonufan, pwan esor itan chon nang
A wewengeni itochun ach Chon Amanau Jesus.
Sa pwapwa o mwareiti Kot ren An tinato Jesus
A tongei o anisi kich seni ach anumaumau.
Ngeifa wewen ewe iit, ach Samon A ken aani,
Siowa A anisi Kich, pwe sipwe feioch sefan.
Pun are Jesus Esap war esor ach sopwosopwoch
Ach anumaumau esap mwuuch, ach tipis esap mwono.
Nge Samach Kot A tongei kich, A tini Noun Anneamon
Chon nuku repwe manau ren, ar feioch epwe unus.

title: Ewe Onnukun Tong, Sipwene Rongorong

lines: Ewe onnukun tong, sipwene rongorongo:
“Kopwe tongei monun unukum usun ka pusin tongek.”
Wen onnuk: “Kopwene kan tongei Om Kot
Chon Nemenem ren unusen om ekiek, pwan, o pwan
Unusen om pochokun non fansoun ran meinisin.”
Sisap pwan nonowo, non ach oput emon, murinno
Sipwe tong fengen, usun kii-iich noun emon chok

title: Fefetan Ngang Won ei An

lines: Fefetan ngang won ei an, tipei pwe mi pwung
Ei an u fetan won; Nge use sinei nge ei an mi onukungaw.
Jesus kose monchen kopwe awena ei
Pwe upwe tongeni kuna ewe anen kinamwe
Pwe epwe pwung fetanin manawei me fonufan.
Noninen osukosuk, fiti chechech pireiir, ren ai uwa sinei
Pwe ewe an mi rikingaw ngeni mano

title: Fonuach Nang Ese Chuen Touaw

lines: Fonuach nang ese chuen touaw
Non ekkei ran sipwe ipweri
Nang ina nenien ach winipos
Ikkewe-ie sipwe nonom feinfeino
O meta (O meta ren ewe ran)
Ranin (Ranin pwapwa ngeni kich)
Sipwe (SIpwe ne tori fonu)
O met ren (O met ren ewe chufengen)
Fan chommong resap aani pwapwa
Manawer mi fokkun tatakis
Ra chok nonom non ar riafou
Nge non nang repwe chip fochofoch

title: Fonufan A Kuna Feioch Ren Chok

lines: Fonufan a kuna feioch ren chok Om umoumoch
Ka fang non aukukun Om tong, esap naf ai apasa
Upwe kon (upwe kokon)
Usun Om tong (tong mi napanap ngeniei)
Mwareiti Itom (tekia o manaman)
Forien Poum (A fokkun murinno)
Non nang o fonufan
Nupwen weires o riafou, Ka fne mefi o sinei
Ka fang Ngunmifen fanitei, a wor pwapwa kinamwe
Ren chok Om tong Mi napanap Ka fangeto Jesus Kraist
Epwe Mööni tipis kana o fang manaw esemuch

title: Forien Poum Meinisin A Mwirinno

lines: Forien poum meinisin a mwirinno,
Itom iit mi tekia mi Samon
Ka ning o pwan unusoch Jesus ai Kot
Meinisin a for fan itei non Jesus Kraist
A nonom feinfeino chok.
Kinisou Jesus ai Kot, Ka fang meinsin fan itei
Ngang emon aramas tipis nge Ka angasaeino
Ka afeiochu ngeniei non Jesus Kraist
Feiochun Chon piin Kana.
Ami mi weiresikis, ou feito Rei,
Feito ami mi chouchou, ria fou
Kinamwe, feioch, o tufich a nonom rei
Meinisin a kii ngeniei non Jesus Kraist
Samonun nang o fonufan.

title: Irapenges Ina Iran Manaw Ngeniei

lines: Irapenges, ourata tong
Kingen Manaw, nge A mano
Ren An asor won Canvary,
Irapenges ina iran manaw ngeniei.
Irapenges, seian umoumoch,
Jesus A siwini neniei
Ren An asor won Canvar,
Irapenges ina iran manaw ngeniei.
Irapenges, unusouchun Kraist;
Pokiten An tong, A kuna saw
Ren An asor won Canvary,
Irapenges ina iran manaw ngeniei.
Irapenges, Nguni a ngas
Ren kinas an uwa kinamwe
Ren An asor won Canvary,
Irapenges ina iran manaw ngeniei.

title: Jesus A Irapenges Won Ewe Chuk Calvary

lines: Jesus A irapenges won ewe Chuk Calvary
/: Pun a masinolo ach tipis kana meinisin :/
Pun eseor emon aramas won fonufan epwe
Fangono manawan faniten chienan
Nge Jesus chok A tongeni fangono
Manawan Fanitach meinisin
Nei pipun me ouchean sipwe tongei
Jesus, nee omwusalo ai tipis, tipis kana meinisin
/: Pun ren Om riafou o weires
A kan fis pwe ai mecheres :/

title: Jesus A Mochen Sipwe nei Usun non ach Iotek

lines: Jesus A mochen sipwe iei usun non ach iotek.
Sememn on nang, ntom epwe pin, Mwuum epwe war
Netipom epwe fis won fonufan usun chok non nang
Kopwe ngeni kem enem mongo ikenai
Nge Kopwe amusa seni kem tipis kana
Usun pwan am aia amusano chokana mi tipis ngeni kem
Nwe, Kote atononga kem non sosot nge
Kopwe angasu kem seni mi ngaw, pun ren Om
Woi, me manaman me ning feinfeino chok, Amen
Jesus A mochen sipwe nikitiw non ach iotek.

title: Jesus Ach Chon Amanaw

lines: Jesus ach Chon Amanaw A fangono inisin
Pwe A mochen pwe en o ngang
Sipwe kuna ewe manaw ‘semwuch
Sipwe kuna ewe amnaw ‘semwuch
Tongen Kot mi fokkun napanap ngeni aramas meinisin
A fang fochofoch Noun we Aneanmon
Esap fokkun nifinifin io, io, io aramas epwe manaw ren
Jesus A mochen pwe kich sipwe pworacho ngeni
Sosotuch me won ei fonufan
Sisap sawasini riafoun Kraist
Pwe ach sounang ew wis mi napanap

title: Jesus En Ai Chon Mas Annim Ekis Meinisin

lines: Jesus En ai Chon Mas Annim ekis meinisin
/: Non riafou o osupwang
Ka peni kich o angasakich non ach riafou. :/
Forin on manauach site tipeseno
Site pwisin tup non ach ekiek a nichipwung inisich. :/
Kote chei mochenin tipom apichi senuk ewe manau
/: A mochen asepa senuk ewe neni mi kinamwe
Mwitir su ngeni ewe Manau. :/
Ngang mi weires o riafou
Nupwen ngang mi nonom non tipis
/: Use tufich upwe fiti ewe chon Amanau
Nupwen A feito kutaei. :/

title: Jesus en Nasaret, Ka Mano

lines: Jesus en Nasaret, Ka mano faniten ai tipis
Ka manaw seni mano, ngeni manaw esemuch
Ka kapas non netipei, “Kon nikitano
Om tipis me om kum, om niuokus.”
Upwe mwareituk Jesus ren om (Kot) Ngunmifen
Mwareituk ren om nenien (nemenem) Samon
Upwe mwareituk ren om nemenem
Ka fang ngeniei manaman me ning fanitom Siowa
Nei chok om fansoun angei an tong ngonuk
Makkei non chaan ewe Nam a pwupwuno fanitach
Jesus Kraist a witiwit fan pwapwa mi Chapur
Feito ren Jesus Kraist pun A tonge-ek

title: Jesus Kraist A uputiw non Bethnemin Judea

lines: Jesus Kraist A uputiw non Bethnemin Judea,
Non muun Samon Erotes: Sourur chon meseran,
Ra feino Jerusanem o ra eisinir,
“A ken uputiw ie Samonun chon Israen.”
Ra suki ar iseis kana, iwe ra fang ngeni I
Mettoch mi auchea rer, rap wan sukano nenuker
Fang ngeni met mi auchea rer.
Erotes a rongorongo, a fakkun ningeringer,
Nge a kapas ngenii ir “oupwe feino kutta I,
Nge are oupwe kuna, oupwe esineto rei,
Pun ngang upwe pwan feino, upwe asamonu I.”
Ewe fu a emwenir tori asamen Bethnem,
Ra kuna ewe monukon A koon non nenien man,
Ra chapetiw fen ngeni, rap wan asamonu I,
Ra pwarata pwe Jesus Ach Samon mi Napanap.

title: Jesus Kraist I Mi Nepopun (Anpha, Omega)

lines: Jesus Kraist n mi Nepopun, pwan I me Nesopwonon
Sipwe sinie pwe n A nonom rech seni nom o ikenai
Mwen ekkew Chuuk resaamwo fis
Pwan mwen Kesaamwo fori unusen fonufan
En chok Kot, En Anpha, Omega
Nei popun A monchen pwe kich sipwe chon pwarata n
Pwe A mochen Epwe anisi kich, seni ach tipis meinisin

title: Jesus Kraist Kose Mochen Kopwe Emweniei

lines: Jesus Kraist Kose mochen kope emweniei
Pwe upwe fetan non Om we saram
Non ai aneamon, netipei epwe chemeni
Pwe En Kosap nikitieino.
Chomong resap atenekiei
Non ai niuokus o noninen
Ese wor emon epwe echipa netipei
Pun En ai Kot ai pwos mi nonom reom.

title: Kingen King, Somonun Samon

lines: Kingen King, Samonun Samon
Jesus, Jesus noun Kot, Ka nouniei
Kingen King, Samonun Samon
Nei popun upwe ingemwareituk
Pun sia choni ewe einang mi fin
Pokiten Kraist, Jesus Kraist
Hannenuia, Hannenuia, iei popun ai kon
Mwareiti Kot, Mwareiti
Mwareiti Kot, Mwareiti
Chon Nemenem, Kingen chon nukunuk
Kinamwe ese much non Jesus Kraist
Jesus, Jesus non Kot, Ka nouniei
Kinamwe esemuch non Jesus Kraist
Nei pipun upwe ingemwareituk

title: Kinisou Ren ei Ran Kot A Fang Ngeni Kich

lines: Kinisou ren ei ran Kot A fang ngeni kich
Sa chu fengen ren ewe chenin Kot
/: Sipwe chechemani usun An Kot we pwan
Epwe eti kich tori feinfeino chok :/
Give of your (Give of your best)
To the Mas- (To the Master)
Give Him first place in your heart
Give Him first (Give Him first place)
In your service into the Battle for Truth
Are kopwe feino nenien riafou
Ach Samon Epwe fokkun nonom reom
/: Non om an meinisin kopwe mwut ngeni Kot
Epwe emwenuk tori feinfeino chok :/

title: Kopwe Seres Nge Pwan Nenengeni

lines: Kopwe seres nge pwan nenengeni fichi-ochu
Manen ran, amona-eochu ranin om fetan
Pun kote serengaw, ka sereni echinifu me ne mataw
Ka os nge sapw an emon ngonuk
Ka sio nge ka serengaw pwe a toon fonu
Ka koko pwe ‘cheri ei pun ua osukosuk’ (osukosuk)
Jesus chok A tongeni An Epwe anisi (oh anisi)
Om tufichingaw me none i mataw
Ika a ngaw ran mi eoch kopwe mwo niwin’to
Asoso ikei, mi wore w fonufanuen ichem
Kopwe chemeni ewe koos mi murinno
Kopwe fetan won pun ka riafou none i mataw

title: Kot Mi Wesewesen Tonge-ei

lines: Kot mi wesewesen tonge-ei,
Mi pwan wor An akkot ngeni manawei
/: nei mine A tinato Jesus,
Pwe Epwe angasano chon tipis. :/
Non Jesus, Non Jesus, (SIpwe kuna manau)
Non Jesus sipwe kuna manau. :/
Ita en io kopwe pwisin finata,
Om akkot me nukun finkien Kot,
/: Pun finiom kopwe feiengaw ren,
Pun esap ina netipen Kot. :/

title: Kot Sam A Pwari an Umoumoch

lines: Kot Sam A pwari An umoumoch
Non Noun Aneamon Jesus Kraist
Ponuko ningan, tipetekison, anneasochis tori mano
Ese wor eukukun kich sa pepetuno non
Amwarar Om ei tong, oh Kot
Ua nonom non ai fotek o mano non tipis
Pwe Jesus A moniei ren chaan
Pwe upwe ngas o manaw feinfeino chok
Sipwe nengeni ei tong mi fat, An Kot Sam fan itach
A nikiti o sap seni Noun Aneamon won irapenges
Pwe A uwei tipisn chon fonufan meinisin
Nei tongen Kot ese wor eukukun
Kich sia pepeutuno non

title: Kraist A malo Fanitei, Halleluja

lines: Kraist A mno fanitei, Hallelujah.
A peias unungat ran, Hallelujah.
A manawsefanita, Hallelujah.
Epwe ne niwnsefal, Hallelujah.
Pwipwi, en mi moneta? Hallelujah.

title: Maing Jesus, Ai Samon (Shout to the Lord)

lines: Maing Jesus, ai Samon, Ese wor Emon usum
Ran meinisin non manawei, Upwe kon o mwareituk
Ai Chon Mas, Chon Sene,
En chok ai Nenien Op
Inamwo met a tori ei,
Usap wes ne fen ngonuk.
Chon fonufan meinisin sipwe kon
Ingemwareiti iten ach Samon
Chuuk kana ra tekisonano mwon,
Saat kana ra konuk
A fet amwararen forien poum
Upwe tongek Jesus, tori feinfeino
Esap wor och epwe wewe ngonuk, ai Kot.

title: Me Nom Non we Tenenimw Bethlehem

lines: Me nom non we tenenimw, Bethlehem
Emon King A uputiw, non eu imwen maan
Chon nang ra kon ngeni I, me fan nang
O asan ewe imwen maan
Ewe fuu a saram o emweni
Ekkewe mwan tipachem seni mesiran
Pun ir ra kutta ewe King
Me nom non we tenenimw, Bethlehem
Emon King A uputiw, Non eu imwen maan
Ika ekkewe mwan mi tipachem ra kutta Jesus
Upwe pwan kutta

title: Merry Christmas, Merry Christmas

lines: Merry Christmas, Merry Christmas ngeni ami meinisin
Mi eito ikenai, none i ran mi ouchea
Ranin uputiwen ach ei Samon Kraist
Iwe, Iwe meta sipwe aani niffang
Ngeni ach ei Samon non ranin ei ikenai
Iwe meta sipwe aani niffang ngeni ach ei Samon
Ach ei Samon Kraist A uputiw
Pwe sipwe kuna manaw ren, sipwe kuna ngasono
Seni ach tipis riafou weires osukosuk meinisin

title: Met A Fis Ngeniei Non Ekei Ranin Soponon

lines: Met a fis ngeniei non ekei ranin soponon
A fen wor ren ai wpwene tunano non manawei
O ai Samon, kose mochen anisieita non ai ei riafou
Pun en chok pipun, en chok, en chok
Ai ei anen kinamwe, oh pun en chok
En chok ai ei manaw ese mwuch.
O ai Samon, Kosap nikitiei, pun ngang mi kana tong
Ren chourekin ai kei tipis mi chomong
Ra kan chouniei, Kose mochen anisieita
Non ai ei riafou, pun en chok popun, en chok en chok
Ai ei anen kinamwe, oh pun en chok
En chok ai ei manaw ese mwuch.

title: Mettoch Meinisin Mi Aani Ngasangas

lines: Mettoch meinisin mi aani ngasangas,
Sipwe mwareiti ewe Samon
Non nnag o pwan won fonufan,
Sipwe mwareiti o eningano I.
Manau a tori kich chon fonufan meinisin
Sipwe pwapwa o mwareiti Jesus.
Maram me fuu ra pwan titin mwareiti
Ewe Samon mi tekia
Uut, noo, asepwan ra pwan pwarata,
Pwe Jesus chok Samon.

title: Nei Usun An Kot ei Tong

lines: Iei usun An Kot ei tong, umoumoch, kirokiroch,
Pwe Jesus, Kingen Manaw, A mano ren fanitach.
Ita ion esap kinisou, konun mwareiti itan?
Upwe konu feinfeino chok, oucheani An asor.
Punun An Kraist irapenges, An Kot chen a tori ei,
Asamen nang ra suk ngeniei, nwini a wesino.
Io ngang pwe upwe iteni emon Noun Kot aramas?
Haleluia, mwareiti Kot! Itei a makk non Puken Nang.
En ai Kot me ai Samon. Upwe fen ngenuk echok,
En Jesus, Ka emweniei,
Ngunum A imweimw noi.
Ka efeiochu ngeniei, ewe manaw esemwuch.
Ka koriei, “Neii achengicheng,”
Ua koruk, “Papa, Semei.”

title: Ngang Emon Aramas Esor Ai Tufich (One Day at a Time)

lines: Ngang emon aramas esor ai tufich
Kose mochen, Maing Jesus Kraist, apochokuna ei
Pwe upwe tongeni manaw fanitom
Anisiei o emweniei non ei ran ikenai
Ikenai chok, Maing Jesus, Kose mochen nonom rei
Anisiei pwe upwe sinei Om akkot fanitei
Nanew a wes, Maing Jesus, eni nesor esap toriei
Emweniei o anisiei non ei ran ikenai
Chommong aramas ra u-ngeniei
Chommong mettoch ra fis ngeniei upwe chepetek ren
Nge ua chemeni Om pwon ngeniei
Pwe Kopwe nom rei, Kopwe anisiei non ei ran ikenai

title: Ngang Upwe Kokori Jesus

lines: Ngang upwe kokori Jesus, upwe chok sacheta nang
Upwe chok tungor: Maing Jesus, tongei o anisi ei.
Jesus Kraist ai Chon Amanaw; tongei o anisi ei
Sor emon ainei fonufan, En echok Jesus, ainei.
Nupwen ai neno o pwata, upwe chok sacheta nang
Upwe chok tungor: Maing Jesus, tongei o anisi ei.
Nupwen a toriei sosot, wpew chok sacheta nang
Upwe chok tungor: Maing Jesus, tongei o anisi ei.
Fansoun ai samaw o petek, upwe chok sacheta nang
Upwe chok tungor: Maing Jesus, tongei o anisi ei.
Nupwen ai tonong non mano, upwe chok sacheta nang
Upwe chok tungor: Maing Jesus, tongei o anisi ei.

title: Non Ai Nonom Ua Rong me Sinei Usun

lines: Non ai nonom ua rong me sinei usun
Ei kot emon Kot me tong
Ese sisi winn on nonomun, a tufich, a tekia seni meinisin
Won fonufan pwan won nang,
Ka nom tori feinfeino chok. ://
Upwe Kinisou mwareituk, o Kot
Pun non om tong En Ka angasa ei
Seni ai kewe chourekin tipis,
Ka awora ai chip me kinamwe
A wor ai apinukoch non En fansoun meinisin;
Ua fang manawei ngonuk,
Pwe Kopwe wisen nemeni
Kopwe Samonun non unusen netipei
Anisiei, Maing, pun wpwe pworacho
Ne pwari Om tong ngeni unusen fonufan.

title: On Paratais (Neni Mi Fokkun Ningoch)

lines: A sasaram fan nang ren rinechun fuu o maram
A saram fanu ren tinen akar mwiritup
A pwari napanapen Kot me An manaman
Non neni ningoch mi apwapwa, ha ha ha ha
/: Wesewesen non Paradais
Wesewesen non Paradais :/
Non Paradais (nenien chon nukunuk)
Non Paradais (‘sor samaw o weires)
Non Paradais (‘sor kechiw netipeta)
Non Paradais (‘sor ananowo fengen)
Non Paradais (pwapwa chok feinfeino chok)
Non Paradais (fokkun ning o echipwor)
Non Paradais (non Paradais)
Neni mi fokkun ningoch
A Mororo ira, fonu, mansusu, o mataw
A enito asepwan eor, effeng, ötiw, notou
A pwari napanapen Kot me An manaman
Non nenien mi apwapwa, ha ha ha ha
/: Wesewesen non Paradais
Wesewesen non Paradais :/

title: Nupwen A Fis Ewe Pwon

lines: Nupwen a fis ewe pwon nefinen ruemon
Kot, Jesus pwan Ngunmifen, eti kem non mwich.
Pungun chon apwupwunu: na en kopwe feino ei,
Ngang upwe feino ie! Om Kot pwan ai Kot.
Ra uta fen mesen Kot o ra pwonfengen
Iwe, ewe pwon resap sotun atana.
Ar pwon epwe nukuchar, nongonong en tong
Epwe fis fan wenechar o fan kinamwe.
Aunumonun ar pwon epwe Jesus Kraist
Unufoch sane sap mu tori feinfeino.

title: Nupwen Kot A Nenegeni

lines: Nupwen Kot A nenengeni fonufan a uren tipis
A fokun netipengaw ren nimengawen won ei fonufan
Pwe a mochen pwe kich meinisin sisap poutmwanino
Pwe sipwe tongeni kuna manaw esemwuch
Feioch chon rongorongo o etiwa Jesus
Pun iir repwe winiti noun Kot
Sa resin kuta ia ewe an sipwe kuna ngas me ie
A tinato Jesus pwe Epwe mano faniten ach tipis

title: O Ai Kot Kinisou Ren Om Tong

lines: O ai Kot kinisou ren Om tong
Ka tinato Jesus Kraist fanitei
(Nge A manno won irapenges)
Emon mi pwung faniten chon tipis
Ai Kot I ( I ewe chen)
O pwan I (I chok manaw)
Kinisou ren om umoumouch
Ka fang non Jesus kraist
/: Sipwe mwareiti Kot, mwareiti Kot
Jeusu A manawsefan
Sipwe mwareiti Kot, mwareiti Kot
Sa kuna ngaseno. :/
O ai Kot kinisou ren Om tong
Ka siwini manawei ren Ngunmifen
(Ka fang kinamwe o ai pwapwa)
A wor ai chip o ai pwora non riafou

title: O Kot Siowa U Mochen

lines: O Kot Siowa u mochen En kopwe nouni ei no
Pun are kosap nouni ei no, upwe ne chok feiengaw.
Pun En an o En pwan manaw,
U mochen chok nom reom
Pwe upwe feiochuni om feioch
Ka amwonata won nang.
Jesus, En kopwe ne eketi kich, tongei kich, anisi kich
Pun sia fokun apwangapwang
Nge are Ka fangeto manaman-om
Sa tongeni maun o pwan pworacho
Pun Jesus ach Samon anisi kich
Sa kinisou ngeni Kot non nang, Jesus Kriast, Ngunmifen
Chon nuku Kot resap nichipung, ra kinamwe.
O Kot Kopwe afeiouch om kapas non nenukach
Om kapas och mongo on ngunuch
Pwe sipwe feifeita ren.
Feiochun chon oucheani Kapasen Kot mi net
Repwe kuna mana murin mano, manaw ese muchuno.
Iwe, sipwe asamonu Jesus ach Chon Amanaw
Sipwe su seni ne poun Satan, pun Jesus angasa kich.
Meinsin sipwe tipew feino mwirin Jesus
Sipwe nikitano pwapwan tipis o fetan won an chokis.

title: Oh, Tumuno-och, Kosap Nukumach

lines: Oh, tumuno-och, kosap nukumach
Kote kechiw o noninen
Pwapwaiti fansoun Christmas
Pun ewe Noun Kot A uputiw rech
Sipwe meseik o kinisou
Pwapwaiti fansoun Christmas
Pun Kot A chemeni kich mi nom non rochopwak
A tinato An Saram, Epwe tin non netipach
Oh, tumuno-och, kosap nukumach
Kote kechiw o noninen
Pwapwaiti fansoun Christmas

title: Pwapwa Kinisou ngeni Samach Kot

lines: Pwapwa kinisou ngeni Samach Kot mi nom won nang
Ren An umoumoch ngeni kich
Manauach a pwan tori none i ranin ikenai,
Pokiten An tong mi napanap.
Siwini (o siwini) netipach (kich meinisin),
Ngeni epwe fis pwe nenian
Poutano tipekoum, ngunungun, amosona,
Pwe ach sounang esap fis ren
Anuwon fopwun kana oute tourur ngeni
Ou cheno chok cheno ngeni mwan
Oute akanamanam, pwur echok nge mwarei chok
Pwe epwe ne tououseni kich.
Sipwe chu ren tipeu, fori pungun fonuach
Pwe itach non mwuu o non namanam
Itepok won ruesop, pwe ete kok waach ei,
Sa osukosuk osupwang.

title: Sa Kapas Usun Jesus

lines: Sa kapas usun Jesus, we Kingen King kana
Samonun Samon kana, tori feinfeino chok
Jesus chok ewe An, we Ennet o Manaw
Sa kapas usun Jesus ran me ran
Sa kapas usun Jesus, we Konikin Manaw
We Asam ngeni Nang, pwan ewe Namen Kot
Jesus, Chon Amanaw, Chon Mas mi Murinno
Sa kapas usun Jesus ran me ran
Sa kapas usun Jesus, we nra mi Ennet
Ewe Noun Aramas, pwan Noun Kot Anamon
Jesus chok A mano, peias, manaw sefan
Sa kapas usun Jesus ran me ran

title: Sa Mwareituk Chon Sene Pun Ka Senani Kich

lines: Sa mwareituk chon sene pun Ka senani kich
O ren chaom mi ochea kich aramas sa ngas
Sipwe mwareituck Chapur o pwapwa nenukach
Pwan kinisou fan chomong ngonuk, Maing Jesus Kraist.
Sa mwareituk pwan kinisou ngonuk iteiten ran
Non manawach meinisin tori feinfeino chok.
Sipwe kinisou Chapur non ranin ikenai
Pokiten chenin Jesus o An kirokiroch
I mi Samon napanap sipwe seikata I
Won ach angang o pwan won nenukach meinisin.
Fan chomong sa kinisou ren ach Chon Amanaw
Ren An chen, tong o manaw aken pwar-ngenikich
O nupwen ach churi i won nang mi echipwor
Sipwe mwareiti tongen Noun Kot Achengicheng.

title: Sa Pwapwa Kich Kinter

lines: Sa pwapwa kich kinter, kich nengin me at,
Pun nepwin fen a war o Christmas a fis.
Nenukach a pwapwa o awach a kon,
Pun Jesus ach Samon A uputiw rech.
Sa angei och niffang mi ouche o och,
Pun Kot a fafang Noun Achengicheng rech.
A kon emon menkon non sepi en man,
Maria me Josef ra tumunu I.
Chon foneni man ra pwan muturuto,
Ra rong me ren chon nang pwe Jesus A war.
Pun chomong pwin chon nang ra feitiw me nang,
Ar kon a amwarar, ar kapas a och.

title: Sipwe Fokun Kinisou ngeni Samach Kot

lines: Sipwe fokun kinisou ngeni samach Kot won nang
Pun An atotai akkar, fonuach a saram ren.
Kinisou ngonuk, Samach Kot won Nang.
Samach mi nonom nang, sa kinisou ngonuk,
Sa pwan mwareiti Om umoumoch.
Anach o pwan unumach, imwach o pwan pisekich
Ufach, kiiach, o pwan waach, sia angei chok me reom.
Semac, inach, o pwan pwiich, chienach o einangach
Aramasch meinisin, foriom o fangonom.
Pochokkunen inisich, o pwan pwapwan manauach
O ach angang o ach mour, Ka afeiochueto.
Sipwe fokun kinisou ngeni Samach Kot won nang
Ren An feioch meinisin n A apwungatiw woch.

title: Sipwe Kinisou ngeni Samach Kot mi nom won Nang

lines: Sipwe kinisou ngeni Samach Kot mi nom won nang
Ren ach manau pochokkun A fang ngeni kich
Non ei ran ikenai. ://
Pun non ierin manauei, ai nonom won
Ei fonufan ese pwung
Ese wenechar ai fofor meinisin. ://
Mwareiti Kot napanap o chengen won fonufan
Umoumoch ngeni aramas kinamwe
Ngeni kich meinisin. ://
Sipwe titingor ngeni Samach Kot mi nom won nang
Epwe amwusano tipisich non ekkewe ier en nom. ://

title: Sipwe Nengeni, Nengeni ewe Irapenges

lines: Sipwe nengeni, nengeni ewe irapenges
Won chukun Calvary, sipwe nengeni-fichi
Pwe sipwe sinei o weweiti usun met Jesus
Won irapenges A kuna turunufas
Won irapenges A kuna riafou o metek Chapur
Won irapenges A wewe-ngeni
Emon mi eniopwut o itengaw
Met mefiom nupwen ka nengeni ei
Won ai ei irapenges, usun Ai tongek
Ngang ua mano fanitom, ifa om kinisou
Uua ponuku manawei, ifa om ponuku?

title: U Sinei Pwe Ai Chon Sene Manau

lines: U senei pwe ai chon sene manau
A manauta me peiasan
U sinei a wato manau semwuuch,
Tong, umoumoch seni Kot Sam.
Ngang mi sinei pwe Jesus A manau,
Chon fonufan sipwe nuku
Ngang mi sinei pwe Jesus A wato
Tong, umoumoch seni Kot Sam.
U sinei pwe ngang upwe pwan manau
Are ngang emon chon nuku
Pun eie anon ach Samon Jesus
Pwe chon nuku ra manau ren.
Iwe, ngang upwe apinukannim
Pwan are toriei mano
Are upwe eti non riafou
Upwe pwan eti non manau.

title: Ua Fen Kuta

lines: Ua fen kuta, ren saram non rochopwak,
Ua kuta ennet, nge kuna esor,
Ua mesechen, use tongeni kuna,
Tori we fuu non Petnehem a suki mesei.
Ua kuna saram a tin non rochopwak
A pwano non nurun, a atiei we an,
Ua kuna saram, itan Samon Jesus
An we mwuun ren feinfeino chok
Samonun Meinisin.
Non nenien mongon man, we kukkunen
Monukon, no A niki, I Noun Kot
Ua nuku, ua sinei mi ennet,
I A siwini manauei, I Noun Kot.
Esinei ngeni fonufan,
Met sia kuna non Petlehem
I we Kingen Pwon,
Sia chapetiw O fen ngeni, Sipwe fen ngeni.

title: Ua Nuku Non we Chuken Calvary

lines: Ua nuku non we Chukun Calvary
Ua nuku inamwo met epwe fis
Nupwen fonufan a wesino o ese chuen nom
Upwe chuen nuku non we irapenges
Ua nuku pwe manawach won ei fonufan
A chok ur ren osukosuk mi chommong
Nge ew ran epwe feito nupwen mettoch meinisin
Repwe moreno o sipwe nom ren Jesus Chok
Ua nuku pwe Jesus A mano fanitach
A wesewesen manaw sefan
O I chok mi tongeni amanawa kich
O sipwe kuna we manaw esemwuch

title: Unconditional Love

lines: Oh ai Kot, nonom ngang nge use weweiti
Pwe Om tong popun ai manaw me fonufan
Unconditional Love, fanitei fanitach meinisin.
Lei minne, ngang ua uta mwen mesom, ai Samon
Non ai kechiw, nge merei nge esap toriei Om tong
Nge merei nge esap naf ai wewe
Unconditional Love, fanitei fanitach meinisin.
Oh ai Kot, nonom ngang non ai apwangapwang
Pwe Om tong mi uwei ngeni ai pochokun
Unconditional Love, fanitei fanitach meinisin.

title: Upwe Eti Jesus Non ewe Nemonun

lines: Upwe eti Jesus non ewe nemonun
Ekis chan un mmanaw o iran manaw nom
Ekis meinisin n Epwe emweniei
Feino mwirin tori mwarin amanaw.
Upwe fokkun feino mwirin Jesus
Ekis A ken mochen, upwe feino won
Upwe fokkun feinoo mwirin Jesus
Ekis meinisin Epwe etiei.
Upwe eti Jesus non ewe nemonun
Ekis menumen o kechiw a wor ia
Are poun amwchu ei pwe ute tumunu ei.
Upwe eti Jesus non ewe nemonun
Na Epwe ange seni ei manawei
Epwe emweniei tori ewe an en nang
Pwe ngang upwe tori ewe chuk un Kot.

title: Upwe Ureni Ai Samon Jesus (I Must Tell Jesus)

lines: Upwe ureni ai Samon Jesus
Usun ai kewe osukosuk
Non riafou Epwe anisiei
I A tongei o tumwunu Noun.
Upwe ureni, ai Samon Jesus!
Usap amwochu ai wosochou
Upwe ureni ai Samon Jesus!
I A tongeni anisiei.
Upwe ureni ai Samon Jesus
Usun ai riafou o weires
I chienei mi fikkun umoumoch
Epwe awesi ai riafou
Non ai sossot o non ai osupwang
I A tongeni angasaei
Upwe ureni ai Samon Jesus
Epwe uwie ai we wosochou
Pwapwan fonufan a Kokkoriei
O netipei a apwangapwang
Upwe ureni ai Samon Jesus
Ren Kraist Upwe Pworacho o win.

title: We Tongen Jesus, Eoch o Echipwor

lines: We Tongen Jesus, eoch o echipwor
We Tongen Jesus, eoch o echipwor
We Tongen Jesus, eoch o echipwor
O-Oh eochun An Tong.
Tekia seni chuuk kana
Anonon seni saat kana
Amwarar seni fu kana
O-Oh eochun An Tong.
We Tongen Jesus, eoch o echipwor
We Tongen Jesus, eoch o echipwor
We Tongen Jesus, eoch o echipwor
O-Oh eochun An Tong.

title: We Wish You A Merry Christmas

lines: We wish you a Merry Christmas
We wish you a Merry Christmas
We wish you a Merry Christmas
and a Happy New Year
Pwapwan ei Ranin Christmas
Pwapwan ei Ranin Christmas
Pwapwan ei Ranin Christmas o ner Mi Na Fo.
Kapongen Pwapwa a tori kemi
Kapongen ei Christmas o ner Mi Na Fo.
Pwapwan ei Ranin Christmas
Pwapwan ei Ranin Christmas
Pwapwan ei Ranin Christmas o ner Mi Na Fo.

title: Won ewe Irapenges won Calvary (The Road Leads Home)

lines: Won fonufan sa kuna sokopaten riafou
Seni iir rese nuku pwan chon mwanecheno
Nge sipwe chechemeni anon Jesus ngeni kich
Pwe I A fen amonnata neniach non imwen Kot
Sipwe tonong non, neniach non imwen Kot
Sipwe nonom ren Jesus tori feinfeino
Sipwe tonong non, neniach non imwen Kot
Oh sipwe nom ren Jesus tori feinfeino
Fan ekkoch sia mefi pwe sipwe chok fangeta
Sia pekus ren ach angang, sia mochen asoso
Nge we ran epwe feito o ach angang epwe wes
Sipwe tou seni fonufan o tonong non Paratis
